metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15601 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in the EXTRACTOR_png_extract_method function in plugins/png_extractor.c, related to processiTXt and stndup. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.6-2
libextractor3 - 1:1.6-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.6-2').
